mod-description: Adds a mini farmer customization menu to the dresser.
IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default. Please use Generic Mod Config Menu to configure.
api-too-old: Please update {{apiName}}({{APIID}}) to at least version {{minversion}}. Current version {{currentversion}}. Integration disabled.
DressersAllowBobbers.title: Dressers Allow Bobbers
DressersAllowBobbers.description: If enabled, dressers will store bobbers.
DressersAllowWeapons.title: Dressers Allow Weapons
DressersAllowWeapons.description: If enabled, dressers will store weapons.
DresserDressup.title: Dresser Dressup
DresserDressup.description: If enabled, allows you to get dressed from the dresser.
HairArrows.title: Hair Arrows
HairArrows.description: If enabled, allows selection of hair on the mini dresser menu.
